meanings.definition: Works independently for different employers on particular assignments.
meanings.sent1: A group of freelances collaborated on the project.
meanings.sent2: Freelances often enjoy the flexibility of their schedules.
meanings.sent3: The freelances joked about their shared office space.
meanings.sent4: In the gig economy, freelances are like modern-day nomads.
meanings.sent5: The image of freelances typing away in coffee shops is quite common.

meanings.definition: Engages in work as a freelancer.
meanings.sent1: She freelances as a graphic designer.
meanings.sent2: Many writers choose to freelances for various publications.
meanings.sent3: He freelances on weekends to earn extra money.
meanings.sent4: Freelancing allows individuals to explore different industries.
meanings.sent5: The artist freelances to support her passion for painting.

meanings.sent1: The freelances gathered for a networking event.
meanings.sent2: As a freelance worker, she freelances for multiple clients.
meanings.sent3: The freelances shared tips on finding new projects.
meanings.sent4: Freelances play a crucial role in the modern economy.
meanings.sent5: She admired the dedication of freelances in their craft.
